message.body: dad seems happy with his fathers day hat. i'm relieved!
yeah, he was showing it off proudly!
also i added a photo of us to fb like an hour ago and already 5 of your friends (and one of mine) liked it!
yay for us. we must be awesome.
pretty sure we are. :) we need to make sure we hang out in the few days between the beach and atlanta!
what day and time do you leave?
thurs afternoon but i have my dentist appointment that morning
ok. i have mine that day too!
twinz
yep. btw, lily and boca miss you guys!
aw, i miss them too!
ps meant to remind you of this earlier but could you get my ####### please?
argh. i literally just left work! i'll figure something out.
im so sorry!!! :(
i was supposed to remember...it was just a horrible chaotic week at work and i kept forgetting.
aw, sorry to hear that. i hope everything's okay!
just busy...ellen's on vaca.
right back to the real world after your trip, huh?
yeah, i know. don't worry, i'll be home soon to comfort you. and to remain infertile, hopefully. love you!
good news...i got the pills. bad news....i forgot to leave them at your house.
can you drop them in the mailbox or something? or in the door? or do you want to get breakfast on sunday or dinner saturday?
i am leaving in the morning for asheville. back sunday night. can i leave them on my counter?
yeah, i'm sure dad will run by there with me. do you need someone to feed the cat? are you camping again?
if he wants food, give him some. but i'll be back in one day so he won't die. james and i are camping, yes.
ah, fun! tell him i said hi.
pretend moon makes me laugh!
what can i say, it's cloudy! :)
maybe tomorrow!
awkward out-of-context quote from andrew: "Also I bet I could impress your mom more than her boyfriend"
james says 'challenge accepted'. note...*i* did NOT say that.
hahahahahaha. he's such a good sport. tell him we were talking about portal play-through times, and that he's got some tough competition.
we're just getting back to summerville. now i have to unpack my junk. again. whee.
the joys of being outdoorsy! did james tell you about the text he just sent me?
yes. he was pretty pleased with his advice. :)
andrew's reply was "Tell him that it's all about knowing how to use your gun." but i decided against passing that along
nope, you should! he'd love to hear the response!
i didn't want to make it overly weird, just the right amount of weird, haha, but okay. :)
trust me, he'd be fine with it. he enjoys witty banter. add double entendre...so much the better. by the way, i love you!
i love you too! hope i can see you sooooon!
breakfast tuesday? i have softball practice after work tomorrow.
sure!
let me know what time works for you.
morning time, haha. other than that it doesn't matter, i want to work this week but lisa hasn't texted me back.
ok. we'll set it up tomorrow.
yo, do you have any idea about breakfast tomorrow?
ummm...8ish? later? i'm flexible.
8ish is good. you wanna pick me up?
sure.
mkay. if we have time do you want to run an errand with me after?
sure.
coolio. see ya then! love you!
i'm ready whenever you are! see you soon! :)
check your driveway
i lost you! :(
jrs, where you left me
very nice!
thanks!
